title: Server Timing
summary: The Server Timing specification enables the server to communicate performance metrics from the request-response cycle to the user agent, and utilizes a JavaScript interface to allow applications to collect, process, and act on these metrics to optimize application delivery.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
